preferences.paragraph2_text: If you do not update your computer, prompts to upgrade will become more frequent and difficult to ignore.
preferences.paragraph1_text: A fully up-to-date device is required to ensure that IT can your accurately protect your computer.
preferences.main_subtitle_text: A friendly reminder from the JESD IT team
preferences.paragraph3_text: To begin the update, click Update Machine, log in with your district credentials (just the first part of your email address), and follow the provided steps.
preferences.paragraph_title_text: An upgrade to macOS Big Sur is required on your machine.
